description.rawText: Description:Insurance PMO/Data Analyst - 50KMy client a global insurance provider is looking for an individual to work with a global heads on planning budget and strategy for 2016 and beyond. This person will also look at all claims product data,  internally and from clients,  interpret this data,  identify any trends and reports to senior stakeholders whilst also looking to provide process improvements around streamlining information. The products and information they works with are complex.  This is a challenging role that sees you work with a global head on a daily basis,  with genuine influence on strategic decision making. Good Candidates Will Possess The Following Experience with data extraction and manipualtion through tools such as Cognos,  Access,  SQL or Tableu Strong excel skills - used to interpret large data sets and for budget planning and analysis Management Information experience Good undergraduate degree that focussed on mathematics,  statistics,  economics or finance Strong communication skills with the desire to challenge current ideasThose that feel they are a strong candidate for the role should forward their CV's and contact 'James' on: 0207 997 1058 to discuss the role in more detail,  or email throughKey words: management information,  excel,  cognos,  access,  SQL,  tableu,  PMO,  MI,  insurance,  CIMAAllegis Group Limited and Aston Carter Limited operate Employment Businesses and Agencies and are companies within the Allegis Group Inc.  group of companies,  the fourth largest staffing company in the world,  (collectively referred to as the "Allegis Group").  TEKsystems and Aerotek are divisions of Allegis Group Limited.  Applicant data will be treated in accordance with the Allegis Group's Privacy Notice http://www. allegisgroup. com/Privacy/Default. aspx).  By submitting personal data to any company or division within the Allegis Group,  the applicant is providing explicit consent to the use of such data by the Allegis Group and to the transfer of such data to and from the Allegis Group companies within the UK,  Europe and outside the European Economic Area in connection with the fulfilment of the applicant's voluntary requests,  and the fulfilment of other job opportunities that match the applicant's profile,  and confirms that they may be contacted about such job opportunities.

companyDescription.rawText: Aston Carter is a global staffing and services provider,  specialising in placing Risk and Compliance,  Operations,  Business and Organisational Change,  Finance,  and Management Consultancy professionals.  Established in 1997 and headquartered in London,  Aston Carter’s solutions include contract,  contract-to-permanent and permanent staffing and services across the United Kingdom,  Europe and Asia. At Aston Carter,  we seek to build long-term,  strategic relationships with our clients,  candidates and contractors,  enabling us to deliver quality staffing services worldwide.  With more than 2, 000 contractors and over 1, 500 permanent placements made annually,  we have the experience,  relationships and resources to provide candidates with the right job opportunity at the right organisation. Aston Carter is a brand within Allegis Group,  the largest private talent management firm in the world.  With global revenues in excess of £7. 0 billion (€8. 21 billion),  Allegis Group provides staffing solutions throughout the United Kingdom,  Europe,  Asia and North America.
